desc: The Home of the best tasting butter cookies! We are a New Zealand specialist baker and food manufacturer, our factory has been providing quality food products to New Zealander for 50 years. Now we send the Lowrey Butter Cookies, Nougats and Shortbread to more than 40 countries by DHL.

layout.text: Our artisanal bakers bring together family recipes, the best of ingredients and generations of experience to bring you the tastiest baked goods.
